Quotes.quote: The Heart wants what it wants
Quotes.author: Darryl

Quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shot you don't take.
Quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky - Micheal Scott

Quotes.quote: I think that pretty much sums it up...I found it at Spencer Gifts.
Quotes.author: World's Best Boss

Quotes.quote: Uh...nope. Nope. This isn't the surprise. It's surprising because you didn't expect it, but you will...you'll know it when you see it.
Quotes.author: World's Best Boss

Quotes.quote: Could you mean a vagina? Because if you do, I want that covered.
Quotes.author: Red

Quotes.quote: No, no... 'cause then the ice melts and it's, like, ~second drink~.
Quotes.author: Beasly

Quotes.quote: Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.
Quotes.author: World's Best Boss

Quotes.quote: If I had to, I could clean out my desk in five seconds, and nobody would ever know that I’d ever been here. And I’d forget, too.
Quotes.author: Fire Guy

Quotes.quote: Boy have you done lost your mind, 'cause I'll help you find it!
Quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

Quotes.quote: I want you to rub butter on my foot… Pam, please? I have Country Crock
Quotes.author: World's Best Buss

Quotes.quote: I love inside jokes. I’d love to be a part of one someday.
Quotes.author: World's Best Boss

Quotes.quote: Pam and I would sometimes hum the same high-pitched note and try to get Dwight to make an appointment with an ear doctor. And, uh, Pam called it… pretendinitis.
Quotes.author: Tall Dude

Quotes.quote: I wake up every morning in a bed that’s too small, drive my daughter to a school that’s too expensive, and then I go to work to a job for which I get paid too little. But on pretzel day? Well, I like pretzel day.
Quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

Quotes.quote: Dwight, you ignorant slut!
Quotes.author: World's Best Boss

Quotes.quote: Bears. Beets. Battlestar Gallactica.
Quotes.author: Tall dude

Quotes.quote: Sometimes the clothes at Gap Kids are too flashy, so I’m forced to go to the American Girl store and order clothes for large colonial dolls.
Quotes.author: Monkey

Quotes.quote: I just want to lie on the beach and eat hot dogs. That’s all I’ve ever wanted.
Quotes.author: Silly Accountant

Quotes.quote: Guess what, I have flaws. What are they? Oh, I don’t know. I sing in the shower. Sometimes I spend too much time volunteering. Occasionally I’ll hit somebody with my car. So sue me.
Quotes.author: Jan's Lover

Quotes.quote: Do I need to be liked? Absolutely not. I like to be liked. I enjoy being liked. I have to be liked, but it’s not like this compulsive need to be liked, like my need to be praised.
Quotes.author: Regional Manager

Quotes.quote: I don’t hate it. I just don’t like it at all and it’s terrible.
Quotes.author: Micheal Scott

Quotes.quote: Darrell Philbin is the most complicated man I've ever met. I mean...who says exactly what they’re thinking? What kind of a game is that?
Quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

Quotes.quote: I am running away from my responsibilities. And it feels good.
Quotes.author: World's Best Boss

Quotes.quote: It’s like I used to tell my wife. I do not apologize unless I think I’m wrong, and if you don’t like it, you can leave. And I say the same thing to my current wife, and I’ll say it to my next one, too.
Quotes.author: Stanley

Quotes.quote: The real crime, I think, was the beard.
Quotes.author: Oscar

Quotes.quote: I have a warm blanket and several cozy pillows. I read a chapter of a book and then it's lights out by 8:30.That's how I sleep at night.
Quotes.author: Cat Lady

Quotes.quote: I wonder what people like about me. Probably my jugs.
Quotes.author: Phylis

Quotes.quote: Andy Bernard does not lose contests. He wins them...or he quits because they are unfair.
Quotes.author: Nard Dog

Quotes.quote: Sometimes I’ll start a sentence and I don’t even know where it’s going. I just hope I find it along the way, like an improv conversation....an improversation.
Quotes.author: Jan's Lover

Quotes.quote: And I knew exactly what to do. But in a much more real sense, I had no idea what to do.
Quotes.author: Micheal Scott

Quotes.quote: Close your mouth, sweetie. You look like a trout.
Quotes.author: Phylis

Quotes.quote: I got six numbers. One more and it would have been a complete phone number.
Quotes.author: Kevin

Quotes.quote: I talk a lot, so I’ve learned to tune myself out.
Quotes.author: Kelly

Quotes.quote: I wanted to eat a pig in a blanket, in a blanket.
Quotes.author: Kevin

Quotes.quote: I wanna do a cartwheel. But real casual-like. Not enough to make a big deal out of it, but I know everyone saw it. One stunning, gorgeous cartwheel.
Quotes.author: Creed

Quotes.quote: I guess I’ve been working so hard, I forgot what it’s like to be hardly working.
Quotes.author: Micheal

Quotes.quote: As a person who buys a lot of erotic cakes, it just feels good to be represented on one.
Quotes.author: Mrs. Vance

Quotes.quote: Why waste time use lot word when few word do trick?
Quotes.author: K Mal

Quotes.quote: We have a gym at home. It’s called the bedroom.
Quotes.author: Mrs. Vancs

Quotes.quote: R’ is among the most menacing of sounds. That’s why they call it ‘murder’ and not ‘mukduk.
Quotes.author: Dwigt

Quotes.quote: Life is short. Drive fast and leave a sexy corpse. That’s one of my mottos.
Quotes.author: Stanley

Quotes.quote: I never thought I’d say this, but I think I ate too much bone marrow.
Quotes.author: D

Quotes.quote: That's what she said!
Quotes.author: World's Best Boss

Quotes.quote: I’m not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
Quotes.author: Micheal

Quotes.quote: If I don’t have some cake soon, I might die.
Quotes.author: Stanley

Quotes.quote: The worst thing about prison was the dementors.
Quotes.author: Prison Micheal

Quotes.quote: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim! Millions of families suffer every year.
Quotes.author: Dwight Snoot

Quotes.quote: Today, smoking is going to save lives.
Quotes.author: Dwigt

Quotes.quote: If I were buying my coffin, I would get one with thicker walls so you couldn’t hear the other dead people.
Quotes.author: D

Quotes.quote: And I knew exactly what to do. But in a much more real sense, I had no idea what to do.
Quotes.author: Micheal

Quotes.quote: There’s a lot of beauty in ordinary things. Isn’t that kind of the point?
Quotes.author: Pamcaso

Quotes.quote: In the Schrute family, the youngest child raises the others. I’ve been raising children since I was a baby.
Quotes.author: Dwight

Quotes.quote: R’ is among the most menacing of sounds. That’s why they call it ‘murder’ and not ‘mukduk.
Quotes.author: Dwigt
